trans-unit.source: :heart: Credits
trans-unit.target: ：心：学分

trans-unit.source: mpy-modcore is published as dual licensed. read properly.
trans-unit.target: mpy-modcore 已发布为 dual licensed 。正确阅读。

trans-unit.source: mpy-modcore is the successor of mpyconfigbase
trans-unit.target: mpy-modcore 是继任mpyconfigbase

trans-unit.source: Add the mpy-modcore folders to your .gitignore
trans-unit.target: 将 mpy-modcore 文件夹添加到您的 .gitignore

trans-unit.source: Alpha state. The API or logical call flow might change without prior notice.
trans-unit.target: Alpha状态。API或逻辑调用流程可能会改变,恕不另行通知。

trans-unit.source: An approach to modularize MicroPython projects.
trans-unit.target: 一种将MicroPython项目模块化的方法。

trans-unit.source: Check CHANGELOG for latest ongoing, or upcoming news
trans-unit.target: 查看 CHANGELOG 以获取最新的正在进行中的或即将发生的新闻

trans-unit.source: Developed with Thonny :+1:
trans-unit.target: 由 Thonny 开发：+1：

trans-unit.source: Development status
trans-unit.target: 发展状况

trans-unit.source: Do i need to fiber my code ?
trans-unit.target: 我需要用光纤来传输我的代码吗?

trans-unit.source: For configuration of automatic startup of WLAN, SoftAP, and WebRepl refer to the source/ sample code also there
trans-unit.target: 关于WLAN、SoftAP和WebRepl的自动启动配置,请参考源代码/示例代码。

trans-unit.source: In case your code breaks between two versions check CHANGELOG information first before creating a ticket / issue on github. thanks.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的代码在两个版本之间中断，请先检查 CHANGELOG 信息，然后再在github上创建票证/问题。谢谢。

trans-unit.source: In oder to run the unsuported modules from the mod3rd folder download this folder from github to the local project folder.
trans-unit.target: 为了从 mod3rd 文件夹运行不受支持的模块，请将此文件夹从github下载到本地项目文件夹。

trans-unit.source: In order to run the samples sync the folder www and etc from github to the local project folder from where running the samples. If running together with boot.py check for run_not_in_sample_mode and set to False to prevent autostarting WindUp and blocking the socket, or provide your own boot.py.
trans-unit.target: 为了运行样本同步的文件夹， www 和 etc 从那里运行样品从GitHub到本地项目文件夹。如果加上运行 boot.py 进行检查 run_not_in_sample_mode 并设置为 False 以防止自动启动饱和和阻塞插座，或提供自己的 boot.py 。

trans-unit.source: In package modext.http there are basic HTTP request handling functions.
trans-unit.target: 在包 modext.http 中,有一些基本的HTTP请求处理功能。

trans-unit.source: In package modext.windup is WindUp as included web server.
trans-unit.target: 在软件包 modext.windup 中，WindUp是包含的Web服务器。

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: 安装

trans-unit.source: Introduce a defined lifecycle and eventing model for modules / devices for convenient handling of loose coupled modules/ device
trans-unit.target: 为模块/设备引入定义的生命周期和事件模型,方便处理松散耦合的模块/设备。

trans-unit.source: License
trans-unit.target: 许可证

trans-unit.source: Like an async coroutine is a fiber an approach of cooperative multitasking. Whereas objectives are the same.
trans-unit.target: 像async coroutine是一种光纤的合作多任务的方法。而目标是一样的。

trans-unit.source: Limitations
trans-unit.target: 局限性

trans-unit.source: Multi-tasking processing support of HTTP requests based on fiber (source). The standard processor for the request handling is blocking mode. Fiber processor (experimental) is not activated by default.
trans-unit.target: 基于光纤（ source ）的HTTP请求的多任务处理支持。用于请求处理的标准处理器是阻止模式。默认情况下未激活光纤处理器（实验性）。

trans-unit.source: New to fiber ?
trans-unit.target: 新到的纤维?

trans-unit.source: No. Serve traditional as you go, or fiber the code.
trans-unit.target: 不,用传统的方式服务,或者用光纤编码。

trans-unit.source: Platform
trans-unit.target: 平台

trans-unit.source: Pros and Cons? Read more on wikipedia about fiber
trans-unit.target: 优点和缺点？在Wikipedia上阅读有关 fiber 更多信息

trans-unit.source: Related project
trans-unit.target: 相关项目

trans-unit.source: Running on MicroPython, more about the MicroPython project on github :+1:
trans-unit.target: 在 MicroPython 上运行，有关 github ：+1上的MicroPython项目的更多信息 ：

trans-unit.source: Sample Code
trans-unit.target: 示例代码

trans-unit.source: Secure Role based Access to URL Routes
trans-unit.target: 基于角色的安全访问URL路由

trans-unit.source: Some sample code can be found in boot.py and under samples.
trans-unit.target: 一些示例代码可以在 boot.py 和 samples 下找到 。

trans-unit.source: Tested on ESP32 with PSRam and ESP8266 (for latter, see limitations below)
trans-unit.target: 在ESP32与PSRam和ESP8266上进行了测试(对于后者,见下面的限制)。

trans-unit.source: The WindUp web server is like Apache based on the concept of Filter and Content Generator. What makes WindUp easy extensible; and flexible how requests are processed.
trans-unit.target: WindUp Web服务器就像 Apache， 基于 Filter and Content Generator 的概念 。是什么使WindUp易于扩展；灵活地处理请求。

trans-unit.source: There are hints how to use or test with curl, all using URL http://your-ip/.... Add the following to /etc/hosts to use them more easily. e.g. when your device has the following IP address:
trans-unit.target: 有提示如何使用或测试与 curl ，所有使用URL http://your-ip/... 。将以下内容添加到 /etc/hosts 可以更轻松地使用它们。例如，当您的设备具有以下IP地址时：

trans-unit.source: Web Server included
trans-unit.target: 包括网络服务器

trans-unit.source: What's new ?
trans-unit.target: 什么是新的?

trans-unit.source: WindUp comes already with a bunch of Filters, e.g. HTML Form data parser, JSON processing, Query parameter extraction, Cookies, Session handling (in-memory), REST stlye URL parameter parser, and extraction, etc.
trans-unit.target: WindUp已经自带了一堆Filter,如HTML Form数据解析器、JSON处理、Query参数提取、Cookies、Session处理(内存)、REST stlye URL参数解析和提取等。

trans-unit.source: WindUp is in Alpha state and not performance optimized. Anyway response times under 1 secs are already possible.
trans-unit.target: WindUp还处于Alpha状态,没有进行性能优化。总之响应时间低于1秒已经是可能的。

trans-unit.source: WindUp supports you to write Role based applications, with a minimal side effort. Refer to the additional Login/Logout module under mod3rd on how to use this.
trans-unit.target: WindUp支持您以最少的精力编写基于角色的应用程序。有关如何使用它的信息，请参考 mod3rd 下的其他 Login/Logout 模块。

trans-unit.source: mpy-modcore - a micro framework for MicroPython
trans-unit.target: mpy-modcore-MicroPython的微框架。

trans-unit.source: mpymodcore
trans-unit.target: mpymodcore

trans-unit.source: no asyncio integration as of now
trans-unit.target: 暂时没有asyncio整合

trans-unit.source: with all mod's enabled as shown here in the sample it will not run on ESP8266 due to memory limit. but wlan, softap, and ntp should work
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了所有的model,如这里的例子所示,由于内存限制,它将无法在ESP8266上运行,但wlan,softap和ntp应该可以工作。

trans-unit.source: with pip (recommended)
trans-unit.target: 用pip(推荐)
